sections.heading: First
sections.text: pleading by State.

sections.heading: Courts
sections.text: may act upon information for all offenses.

sections.heading: Information
sections.text:
may be filed following preliminary examination when accused is bound over or

when preliminary examination is waived; when information is filed on affidavit;

limitation of time; amended information may include additional charges if plea

agreement is rejected or withdrawn.

sections.heading: District
sections.text:
attorney or Attorney General to be informant; endorsement of names of

witnesses; affidavits.

sections.heading: Court
sections.text: clerk may accept information filed electronically; procedure; service.

sections.heading: Duties
sections.text:
of district attorney or Attorney General; written statement containing reasons

why information not filed.

sections.heading: Judge
sections.text: may require Attorney General to prosecute if district attorney refuses.

sections.heading: Nature
sections.text: and contents generally.

sections.heading: Surplusage.
sections.text: Surplusage.

sections.heading: Amendment;
sections.text: notice of habitual criminality, habitually fraudulent felon or habitual felon.

sections.heading: Charging
sections.text: defendant by fictitious or erroneous name: Insertion of true name.

sections.heading: Joinder
sections.text: of offenses.

sections.heading: Prosecution
sections.text:
not required to elect between different offenses or counts; plea of guilty or

guilty but mentally ill to one offense does not preclude prosecution for other

offenses.

sections.heading: Joinder
sections.text: of defendants.

sections.heading: Issuance
sections.text: of warrant or summons.

sections.heading: Form
sections.text: of warrant; fixing and endorsement of amount of bail.

sections.heading: Manner
sections.text: of proceeding on giving bail in another county.

sections.heading: Ordering
sections.text: defendant charged with felony into custody unless increased bail is given.

sections.heading: Form
sections.text: of summons.

sections.heading: Execution
sections.text: of warrant and service of summons.

sections.heading: Return
sections.text: of warrant and summons; reissuance.
